text: Andreas Kunz (24 July 1946 â€“ 1 January 2022) was a East German Nordic combined athlete. He won a bronze medal at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble in the Individual event. He competed for the SV Dynamo/SC Dynamo Klingenthal. He was born in Leipzig, Germany. Kunz died on 1 January 2022 in Leipzig, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for East Germany Category:Sportspeople from Leipzig
title: Andreas Kunz
